verses.verse: Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>cometh,<s%> and thy <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee.

For I will <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8155>rifled,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7693>ravished;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and fight <S%H3898>against<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> as <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>

And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H4480>east,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%> shall <S%H1234>cleave<s%> in the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H2677><s%> thereof toward the <S%H4217>east<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1516>valley;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H4185>remove<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of it toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H682>Azal:<s%> yea, ye shall <S%H5127>flee,<s%> like <S%H834>as<s%> ye <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6918>saints<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H216>light<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3368>clear,<s%> nor dark: <S%H7087><s%>

But it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3915>night:<s%> but it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that at <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H3389><s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H314>hinder<s%> <S%H3220>sea:<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and in <S%H2779>winter<s%> shall it <S%H1961>be.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> as a <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H4480>Geba<s%> <S%H1387><s%> to <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and it shall be lifted <S%H7213>up,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> in her <S%H8478>place,<s%> from <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H4480>gate<s%> <S%H8179><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H6434>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3342>winepresses.<s%>

And men shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it, and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> utter <S%H2764>destruction;<s%> but <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H6633>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> Their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> while <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon their <S%H5921>feet,<s%> <S%H7272><s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H2356>holes,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumult<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> among them; and they shall lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall rise <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H899>apparel,<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

And <S%H3651>so<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H4046>plague<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> of the <S%H6505>mule,<s%> of the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and of the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H4264>tents,<s%> as <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4046>plague.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall even go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1767><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and to <S%H2287>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H834>whoso<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> even <S%H5921>upon<s%> them shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> go not <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> that have <S%H3808>no<s%> rain; there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H4046>plague,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> come not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> come not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4698>bells<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> UNTO THE <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H5518>pots<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> like the <S%H4219>bowls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Yea, <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5518>pot<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holiness<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> therein: and in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
